Text: Re XterraPlease respond to Barry J Melotte Your gonna love that truck but you already know that because the Frontier and the Xterra are the same chassis They will ride much the same We love it Congrats on the new house and the new stadium Good luck to those Broncos Bear Original Message From To Sent Monday August AM Subject Xterra Hi Bear Just wanted to tell you we are now owners of a Xterra along with our Frontier Truck We traded in our Quest minivan for the Xterra I couldnt get Jeff to go for the yellow one like yours so we settled for the Silver Ice Sara thinks its pretty cool of course she hasnt dared to ask to drive it yet since she already crashed her car into our neighbors parked truck and ruined the quarter panel drivers door and passenger door Shes off to a good start with her license I have to get back to work but I just wanted to tell you about our new car Hope everything is going well OH and Congratulations on the BABY Theresa This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
